title: wtf is this
body: why am I banned for 14 days for this?

replies.body:
I am going to say two things;

First and foremost, if you have been wrongfully punished, file a [Support Ticket](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Riot Support can overturn punishments that have been erroneously applied, although false-positive punishments are exceptionally rare.

Second; _I am very skeptical of that screenshot._ The font doesn't look right and the bold-face text (14-day Suspension, Your Chat Logs, Game 1, I Understand) look sketchy, both figuratively and literally due to a lack of anti-aliasing. Something about your screenshot rubs me the wrong way, so I can't help but feel that it might have been edited to omit the rest of your chat logs.

Whatever the case, Riot does have the full, unedited chat logs, so if it was edited, know that you'll be pretty disappointed with the results of your Support Ticket. If it wasn't, then the punishment will likely get overturned.

> [{quoted}](name=Umbral Regent,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rTau2hNe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-06T04:57:06.833+0000)
>
> I am going to say two things;
> 
> First and foremost, if you have been wrongfully punished, file a [Support Ticket](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Riot Support can overturn punishments that have been erroneously applied, although false-positive punishments are exceptionally rare.
> 
> Second; _I am very skeptical of that screenshot._ The font doesn't look right and the bold-face text (14-day Suspension, Your Chat Logs, Game 1, I Understand) look sketchy, both figuratively and literally due to a lack of anti-aliasing. Something about your screenshot rubs me the wrong way, so I can't help but feel that it might have been edited to omit the rest of your chat logs.
> 
> Whatever the case, Riot does have the full, unedited chat logs, so if it was edited, know that you'll be pretty disappointed with the results of your Support Ticket. If it wasn't, then the punishment will likely get overturned.

This, basically. For reference, here are a few examples of what reform cards usually look like:

https://i.gyazo.com/61f325da1ea31f5909464b2d5e1ff251.png

https://i.imgur.com/qqi4WSE.png

https://i.imgur.com/zZIiUaf.png

I'm not going to jump to "edited to omit," especially as it's super easy to make edits without messing up the result like this, but something happened to make it look so different. If OP could post a screenshot that hasn't had anything happen to it, that would help.
http://prntscr.com/qy8h7l here is a better screen shot

> [{quoted}](name=MASENKO,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rTau2hNe,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2020-02-06T05:05:32.656+0000)
>
> http://prntscr.com/qy8h7l here is a better screen shot

Are you playing on integrated graphics or something? This looks like something out of a game 20 years ago lol. I'm getting like D2 flashbacks looking at your launcher/text. What resolution is that?
yeah these have bullshit written all over them

Actually it doesn't necessarily. Look at the text outside of the logs. You have similar artefacts and super weird spacing, even though there's absolutely no need to edit that text. This is most likely a format / compression problem.

That doesn't mean OP didn't edit them, of course. Just saying that those artefacts really only have "badly compressed image" written all over them. Well... technically it's a little too well compressed, I suppose.

> [{quoted}](name=MASENKO,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rTau2hNe,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2020-02-06T05:05:32.656+0000)
>
> http://prntscr.com/qy8h7l here is a better screen shot

That's not better at all. There's just more of it.
It isn't fake I swear to you it's real
For me the report-card looks a bit edited - OP maybe ping a moderator over Discord and directly show them in real-time (videocall) that this is not fake.

OP, regarding the "edited" screenshot, can you try to make a screenshot with anything that doesn't convert it to a PNG?

Because I've seen this stuff before, and it's usually an issue with the way PNG compresses text. It does so extremely efficiently, but in the process it sometimes loses the detail of the original font.

To answer you actual question: There was, at least at some point in the past, a bug that would make the chat logs not display properly. Your best bet here is to write a support ticket. Worst-case they'll give you the actual full chat logs, best-case they'll revert the punishment because the single line "lol" is obviously not punishable.

> [{quoted}](name=TrulyBland,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rTau2hNe,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2020-02-06T14:16:45.511+0000)
>
> Because I've seen this stuff before, and it's usually an issue with the way PNG compresses text. It does so extremely efficiently, but in the process it sometimes loses the detail of the original font.

This is incorrect. PNG doesn't care whether it's compressing an image of text or of anything else, and doesn't lose detail anywhere, because it's a lossless format.

Huh... got some stuff mixed up then, I suppose. Thought PNG had both lossy and lossless options.

Still, I've seen this before, and I remember it being solved as compression / file format related. As said in a different post: If it was just the result of editing, that doesn't explain why the rest of the text is also screwed up.

Edit: Can't seem to find anything in this regard though, right now. Guess I'll just have to eat my words and leave it at that.

Edit2: Looked at the image a bit more in detail, and yeah… It seems like the problem is a whole lot simpler than that. It's simply the resolution. All the letters are literally just one pixel wide. It's bound to look weird at such a low resolution, and obviously can't look like the original font anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=TrulyBland,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rTau2hNe,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2020-02-07T10:04:17.695+0000)
>
> 
> Edit2: Looked at the image a bit more in detail, and yeah… It seems like the problem is a whole lot simpler than that. It's simply the resolution. All the letters are literally just one pixel wide. It's bound to look weird at such a low resolution, and obviously can't look like the original font anymore.

Anti-aliasing, the thing none of the font in the picture has, is the process of blurring where two colors meet to give the illusion of lines and curves that are not possible otherwise (since we're dealing with a bunch of squares to make an image).

When it comes to screenshots, the lower the resolution the more likely anti-aliasing will be evident to keep the font the same shape when the number of pixels are insufficient.

It's not unheard of for the IFS to have a hiccup every now and again.  There has been a few cases where the IFS gave people the wrong punishment, the wrong chat log, the wrong type of punishment (verbal instead of game play or vice versa), harsher/lighter punishment than it should be, etc.  Rito has always rectified these mistakes.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Send in a support ticket and ask them to clarify your punishment for you.  People on the board has no way to ascertain the truth of what happened to your account, be it on your end or the IFS end.

Serious note though, maybe they didn't send you the rest of the logs? Just msg them. I remember seeing someone getting punished with the logs only saying 'lol' and then a Rioter looked it up and posted the entire thing. I hope that its a mistake on Riot's part, slim as the hope is. Good luck, OP.
